title: Simulation-Based Program for Enhancing Chemical Knowledge Comprehension and Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: General chemistry fundamentals (ionic bonding, covalent bonding, molecular structures, etc.)
context.additional_context: Provision of customized simulation environments accounting for learners' spatial ability differences

learning_goals: Learners can visualize chemical reaction processes in a simulation environment and explain them with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can transfer and apply knowledge acquired from simulations to new problem-solving scenarios with over 75% effectiveness.
Regardless of spatial ability level, learners achieve at least a 40% improvement in understanding chemistry concepts compared to pre-assessment scores.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
